name: RJ_Collection
description: My personal tweaks. Nothing to see here
changeNote:
Changed "Glowing Essence" to "GlowingGoop" in the Sickle loot table. Glowing Essence is not looted, it's crafted from GlowingGoop.
Test of extending Sickle collision box to see if it fixed the inability to harvest some resource under water.
Lowered Random Force on Dead bodies in HarvestableComponent_v2 to see if they stop flying away.
Gave Taskmasker Tier 1 Craft Speed 1 so they are of some use.
Removed Single Player Boss Mob changes. Moved into it's own mod.
Added fixes from Exiled_Lands_Improved.
Made Altars and Water Wells not require a huge exclusive area.
author: Robjer
